title: WHIRLING F2 / KIM WAKEUP
description: If you succeeded the final Authority check to warn Kim.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You see the lieutenant's familiar s..."
dialogueTree.text: You see the lieutenant's familiar shape in the orange jacket. It turns double -- then triple -- from the pain.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "It's nothing. You're alive, that's..."
links.text: It's nothing. You're alive, that's what matters.

links.title: You: ""Kim....""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Sunrise, parabellum*," the lieute..."
links.text: "*Sunrise, parabellum*," the lieutenant says. He's in the middle of a freshly cleaned room, with the fan above his head like a halo. His face is covered in bruises.

links.title: You: ""Ouch.""
links.text: "Ouch."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not *ouch* time yet. You just..."
links.text: "It's not *ouch* time yet. You just got a *drouamine* pill an hour ago. Wait until it wears off."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Drouamine. Then it's not *that* bad..."
links.text: Drouamine. Then it's not *that* bad. Neither surgical, nor organ-damage bad. But still under-the-counter bad.

links.title: You: ""The room... it's clean.""
links.text: "The room... it's clean."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mr. Garte cleaned it. It took him..."
links.text: "Mr. Garte cleaned it. It took him an entire day."

links.title: You: ""How long have I been out?""
links.text: "How long have I been out?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Two days. In and out -- you've bee..."
links.text: "Two days. In and out -- you've been up enough to take drouamine and curse. And drink water."

links.title: You: ""Ouch.""
links.text: "The piss-jacket, Kim... you took it off?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not *ouch* time yet. You just..."
links.text: "Yes," he replies. "The joke wasn't funny any more. I took it off."
The close proximity of death must have made the lieutenant contemplate his life choices. He's *done* with the jacket.

links.title: You: ""What did you say... sunrise...""
links.text: "What did you say... sunrise..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sunrise, Parabellum. Sunrise, Prep..."
links.text: "Sunrise, Parabellum. Sunrise, Prepare-for-War. It's an old revolutionary saying."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Isn't that written on your..."
links.text: Isn't that written on your...

links.title: You: ""My gun. It's engraved on it.""
links.text: "My gun. It's engraved on it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cops like it.""
links.text: "Cops like it."

links.title: You: ""Is it... war today?""
links.text: "Is it... war today?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The gates of the harbour are board..."
links.text: "The gates of the harbour are boarded up. The streets are a little more empty. Apocalyptic violence is yet to erupt, I am relieved to say." He looks out the window.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we may have held it off --..."
links.text: "I think we may have held it off -- for now." He unzips his bomber jacket. "Barely."

links.title: You: ""Good.""
links.text: "Good."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. We have also completely faile..."
links.text: "Yes. We have also completely failed. But that's okay."

links.title: You: ""A pity.""
links.text: "A pity."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Pity?""
links.text: "Pity?"

links.title: You: ""I seriously want this... social or..."
links.text: "I seriously want this... social order to collapse now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see the drouamine is working.""
links.text: "I see the drouamine is working."

links.title: You: ""This is the end and I am its trump..."
links.text: "This is the end and I am its trumpeter, Kim. The quicker we get it done the better."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhuh," he nods. "I see the drouami..."
links.text: "Uhuh," he nods. "I see the drouamine is working."

links.title: You: ""Pity all the whores and traitors h..."
links.text: "Pity all the whores and traitors haven't been washed away! It's like I suffer... (cough) but for what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The whores, yes. That's good to he..."
links.text: "The whores, yes. That's good to hear."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Rhetorical flare. He does not actua..."
links.text: Rhetorical flare. He does not actually welcome the return of the whores.

links.title: You: ""You misunderstand me. (cough) I me..."
links.text: "You misunderstand me. (cough) I meant that in a... *disco* way."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cool.""
links.text: "Cool."

links.title: You: ""Nothing. I take it back.""
links.text: "Nothing. I take it back."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need, officer. You wanted thing..."
links.text: "No need, officer. You wanted things to go South outside -- that's okay, we all do from time to time. They haven't, though. Yet."

links.title: You: ""Ouch.""
links.text: "Ouch."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right." He nods in agreemen..."
links.text: "That's right." He nods in agreement. "Ouch, indeed."

links.title: You: ""What... happened?""
links.text: "What... happened?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? You shot the major..."
links.text: "What happened? You shot the major in the face. A firefight ensued."

links.title: You: ""Is he dead?""
links.text: "Is he dead?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Half Light: "You're a real killer, Harry."
links.text: You're a real killer, Harry.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A bloodstained killer."
links.text: A bloodstained killer.

links.title: You: ""I warned them I am a killer of kil..."
links.text: "I warned them I am a killer of killers..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That you did." The lieutenant look..."
links.text: "That you did." The lieutenant looks at you with a peculiar expression. He then continues...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "A man of his word, this killer of k..."
links.text: A man of his word, this killer of killers.

links.title: You: ""I'm a killer...""
links.text: "I'm a killer..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're an officer of the RCM." He..."
links.text: "You're an officer of the RCM." He continues without waiting for a reply...

links.title: You: "Swallow..."
links.text: Swallow...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? You shot the major...."
links.text: "What happened? You shot the major. Unsuccessfully. A firefight ensued."

links.title: You: ""What... happened then?""
links.text: "What... happened then?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As retaliation, their rifleman tri..."
links.text: "As retaliation, their rifleman tried shooting you. He missed -- or you dodged..."

links.title: You: ""I dodged.""
links.text: "I dodged."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then I shot and wounded him while..."
links.text: "Then I shot and wounded him while Glen took a bullet in the spine." He nods. "It was meant for me. Glen did not survive." There's a pause.

links.title: Empathy: "This is not the first person to die..."
links.text: This is not the first person to die in his place. He goes on.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Titus, Fat Angus, and Theo charged..."
links.text: "Titus, Fat Angus, and Theo charged. Angus and Theo did not make it. They both died before they made it to intensive care. Titus survives. So do Alain and the musician, I forget his name..."

links.title: You: ""Titus is dead?""
links.text: "Titus is dead?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: "Nod."
links.text: Nod.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were bleeding out by then..."..."
links.text: "You were bleeding out by then..." He thinks. "You warned me -- I was able to disarm Kortenaer before he got the jump on me."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Thank you. Although..."
links.text: Thank you. Although...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I killed her," the lieutenant repe..."
links.text: "I killed her," the lieutenant repeats himself. "And that's what happened."

links.title: You: ""Titus is *dead*?""
links.text: "Titus is *dead*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He pulls on his cigarette in..."
links.text: "Yes." He pulls on his cigarette intently.

links.title: You: ""So you also killed.""
links.text: "So you also killed."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
links.text: He nods.

links.title: You: ""I thought you only smoked one a da..."
links.text: "I thought you only smoked one a day."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is the one.""
links.text: "This is the one."

links.title: You: ""And they're all dead, all three......"
links.text: "And they're all dead, all three... of the contractors?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""De Paule was the last to die." He..."
links.text: "De Paule was the last to die." He nods. "Evrart had their bodies returned to Krenel for a funeral. The company is yet to retaliate."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because we *deterred* them? Or Joy..."
links.text: "Because we *deterred* them? Or Joyce did? Maybe the harbour -- in full lockdown -- is too costly a target. Or maybe..." he breathes in the fumes, thinking.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe they are simply taking their..."
links.text: "Maybe they are simply taking their time and will attack soon? I don't know."

links.title: You: ""And the major...""
links.text: "And the major..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... is in a private hospital acros..."
links.text: "... is in a private hospital across the river. Krenel claimed him from the local butcher shop, where Titus died. Turns out he's *insured*."

links.title: Half Light: "There is unveiled anger in his voic..."
links.text: There is unveiled anger in his voice.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We won't get to him anymore. The g..."
links.text: "We won't get to him anymore. The good news is -- he's not coming here either. I did some damage."

links.title: You: ""How many casualties... on the Unio..."
links.text: "How many casualties... on the Union's side? Total?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Five: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat o..."
links.text: "Five: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And Elizabeth too -- Elizabeth Bea..."
links.text: "And Elizabeth too -- Elizabeth Beaufort was her name. The gardener."

links.title: You: ""She did not make it?""
links.text: "She did not make it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. She bled out before Evrart's s..."
links.text: "No. She bled out before Evrart's surgeon could help her. Evrart sent his personal doctor but..." He shakes his head. "A costly loss for the Union. She was being trained for leadership."

links.title: You: ""If I would have presented the theo..."
links.text: "If I would have presented the theory better... to their leader..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She never had a chance. She should..."
links.text: "She never had a chance. She should not have been there in the first place. There was no way to *convince* them."

links.title: Volition: "Stop this line of thought now. You'..."
links.text: Stop this line of thought now. You're too broken for ghosts.

links.title: You: ""I did all I could there.""
links.text: "I did all I could there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know you did. It's all right.""
links.text: "I know you did. It's all right."

links.title: Volition: "That's right."
links.text: That's right.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Six: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. Th..."
links.text: "Six: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat o..."
links.text: "Four: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. T..."
links.text: "Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four: Glen, Theo, Angus, the fat o..."
links.text: "Four: Glen, Theo, Angus, the fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angu..."
links.text: "Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angus, the fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Three: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat..."
links.text: "Three: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Theo -- he was just too old for combat."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angu..."
links.text: "Four: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause.

links.title: You: ""And that's..." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "And that's..." (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All." He nods."
links.text: "All." He nods.

links.title: You: ""An absolute disaster.""
links.text: "An absolute disaster."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, officer," he says calmly. "Si..."
links.text: "Yes, officer," he says calmly. "Six people are dead. It's not a success."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Plus one. Ruby."
links.text: Plus one. Ruby.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But what's done is done. The viole..."
links.text: "But what's done is done. The violence is cordoned off, the mercenary tribunal is neutralized. The worst scenario has not materialized -- yet."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And..." he smiles: "We are still a..."
links.text: "And..." he smiles: "We are still alive -- both of us."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He did not expect you both to survi..."
links.text: He did not expect you both to survive once you stepped between those two armies.

links.title: Endurance: "His smoking, his hunched back... yo..."
links.text: His smoking, his hunched back... you have it worse, but he took a real beating. That cigarette has *medicinal* purposes.

links.title: You: ""It's a total shit show, Kim.""
links.text: "It's a total shit show, Kim."

links.title: You: ""Not *that* bad -- all things consi..."
links.text: "Not *that* bad -- all things considered."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh no, officer," he says calmly --..."
links.text: "Oh no, officer," he says calmly -- without accusation. "It's pretty bad. Six people are dead."

links.title: You: ""I don't see how it could have gone..."
links.text: "I don't see how it could have gone any better."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer -- and this..."
links.text: "Let's face it, officer -- and this is both of our fault..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone *a little* better. Six people are dead."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer," he says c..."
links.text: "Let's face it, officer," he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone a little better. You could've *not* missed."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer..." he says..."
links.text: "Let's face it, officer..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone a little better. You could've *not* missed with the bomb. If you already threw it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer..." he says..."
links.text: "Let's face it, officer..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone a little better. The diplomatic approach was terrible. It was my mistake. I should have attacked..."

links.title: Half Light: "He was afraid."
links.text: He was afraid.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I killed her." The lieutenant take..."
links.text: "I killed her." The lieutenant takes a cigarette from his coat pocket and lights it. A bitter smell fills the room. "And that's what happened."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Thank you."
links.text: Thank you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were bleeding out, you said so..."
links.text: "You were bleeding out, you said something, I don't know what..." He thinks. "And you warned me. I was able to disarm officer de Paule before she got the jump on me."

links.title: You: ""Eugene?""
links.text: "Eugene?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. He's still alive too.""
links.text: "Yes. He's still alive too."

links.title: You: ""Then what?""
links.text: "Then what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I shot and wounded him. While Glen..."
links.text: "I shot and wounded him. While Glen took a bullet in the spine. It was meant for me -- he did not survive." There's a pause.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As retaliation, their rifleman tri..."
links.text: "As retaliation, their rifleman tried shooting you. He hit the cuirass... I heard it go off. I was looking for a clear line of sight to him."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He sounds a *tiny bit* sorry he did..."
links.text: He sounds a *tiny bit* sorry he did not find it before you got hit.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As retaliation, their rifleman sho..."
links.text: "As retaliation, their rifleman shot you. He hit. With his carabine -- I was looking for a clear line of sight. When I found it..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? You threw an improv..."
links.text: "What happened? You threw an improvised petroleum bomb at the major. A firefight ensued."

links.title: You: ""The tie made me do it.""
links.text: "The tie made me do it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He does not answer, and searches fo..."
links.text: He does not answer, and searches for something in his coat pocket instead.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A smoke most likely."
links.text: A smoke most likely.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You tried to throw an improvised p..."
links.text: "You tried to throw an improvised petroleum bomb. It missed. Then you said *it's a fiasco, bratan* in a funny voice. A firefight ensued."

links.title: You: ""The tie made me do it.""
links.text: "The tie made me do it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant does not answer, ins..."
links.text: The lieutenant does not answer, instead searching his coat pockets for something.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A smoke most likely."
links.text: A smoke most likely.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? We tried to take th..."
links.text: "What happened? We tried to take the diplomatic route and hoped they wouldn't attack first. They did. The major gave the command."

links.title: You: ""How bad am I hurt?""
links.text: "How bad am I hurt?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Pretty bad, officer. You've suffer..."
links.text: "Pretty bad, officer. You've suffered two wounds. The first is below your shoulder. The bullet passed through your shoulder blade, luckily missing your lung -- and heart."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The second shot hit you in the thi..."
links.text: "The second shot hit you in the thigh -- the left quadriceps." He points to your leg. "No major arteries were nicked, but the bullet had to be removed. A bacterial infection was treated with mercurochrome."

links.title: You: ""Can I... walk?""
links.text: "Can I... walk?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will see.""
links.text: "We will see."

links.title: Endurance: "With considerable pain and the stit..."
links.text: With considerable pain and the stitches tearing every now and then -- you should be able to do it.

links.title: You: ""I'm a psycholocomotor.""
links.text: "I'm a psycholocomotor."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. You'll need to be... whateve..."
links.text: "Good. You'll need to be... whatever that is."

links.title: You: ""Has anyone from my station been to..."
links.text: "Has anyone from my station been to see me?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "A man and a woman sit in the front..."
links.text: A man and a woman sit in the front seat of an armoured motor carriage. The woman is driving, the man lights a cigarette. Jean Vicquemare is his name, the asphalt vanishes under the wheels of the machine. Ahead, harbour cranes rise to the sky...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""Back to that shithole," he says."
links.text: "Back to that shithole," he says.

links.title: You: ""They don't care about me at all.""
links.text: "They don't care about me at all."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I called your station after the fi..."
links.text: "I called your station after the fight. The injury was logged in. They told me they've sent officers to join you on the site."

links.title: You: ""Odd. You haven't seen any, have yo..."
links.text: "Odd. You haven't seen any, have you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There's a pause. "I'm sure they're..."
links.text: There's a pause. "I'm sure they're worried about you."

links.title: Rhetoric: "That means he hasn't seen them arou..."
links.text: That means he hasn't seen them around while you were out. They're not *really* worried about you. If they were, wouldn't they be here?

links.title: You: ""If they're so worried about me whe..."
links.text: "If they're so worried about me where are they?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know.""
links.text: "I don't know."

links.title: Drama: "He may have some idea -- but he's n..."
links.text: He may have some idea -- but he's not gonna get into it with you.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "That's between you and them, he thi..."
links.text: That's between you and them, he thinks.

links.title: You: "Better not agitate yourself further..."
links.text: Better not agitate yourself further, it already hurts.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Sorry."
links.text: Sorry.

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure they're worried about you.""
links.text: "I'm sure they're worried about you."

links.title: Rhetoric: "No. They would be here if they were..."
links.text: No. They would be here if they were truly worried.

links.title: You: ""Good. I don't need them.""
links.text: "Good. I don't need them."

links.title: You: ""Really?""
links.text: "Really?"

links.title: You: ""Isn't that... strange?""
links.text: "Isn't that... strange?"

links.title: You: ""If not my station, then who treate..."
links.text: "If not my station, then who treated me?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I did.""
links.text: "I did."

links.title: You: ""Thank you.""
links.text: "Thank you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need.""
links.text: "No need."

links.title: You: ""I didn't know you could... do that.""
links.text: "I didn't know you could... do that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's part of a detective's task ch..."
links.text: "It's part of a detective's task chain. You can do it too."

links.title: Interfacing: "Actually, you *can*. You can even r..."
links.text: Actually, you *can*. You can even remove a fractured bullet, it seems...

links.title: Interfacing: "Can you? You're pretty sure you can..."
links.text: Can you? You're pretty sure you can't.

links.title: You: ""Are you hurt?""
links.text: "Are you hurt?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not very." He rubs his chin. "I ha..."
links.text: "Not very." He rubs his chin. "I have a concussion from the major beating me with the butt of his gun. I try to not move too much."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Things would be much worse if you..."
links.text: "Things would be much worse if you didn't warn me." There's a pause. "Thank you. I did not see him coming. Stupid of me..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not very." He rubs his chin. "I ha..."
links.text: "Not very." He rubs his chin. "I have a concussion from that woman beating me with the butt of her gun... I try to not move too much."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Things would be worse if you didn'..."
links.text: "Things would be worse if you didn't warn me." There's a pause. "Thank you. I did not see her coming. Stupid of me..."

links.title: You: ""Okay...." (Get up.)"
links.text: "Okay...." (Get up.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Easy now..." The lieutenant turns..."
links.text: "Easy now..." The lieutenant turns double again, before your eyes. An orange hue of pain...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You can take it. Just don't lean on..."
links.text: You can take it. Just don't lean on that leg of yours too heavily.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Your balance is *way* off. You feel..."
links.text: Your balance is *way* off. You feel like you're about to fall over on that thing...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How are you?""
links.text: "How are you?"

links.title: You: ""Gnhhhh...""
links.text: "Gnhhhh..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you -- teet..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you -- teetering on your feet.

links.title: You: ""My... disco days are done.""
links.text: "My... disco days are done."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Your disco days should have been d..."
links.text: "Your disco days should have been done quite a while back, officer."

links.title: You: ""I feel fantastic. Let's... rock.""
links.text: "I feel fantastic. Let's... rock."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
links.text: He nods.

links.title: You: ""Who cares. Who cares about me. It..."
links.text: "Who cares. Who cares about me. It doesn't matter."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't reply -- jus..."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't reply -- just looks at you teetering on your feet.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "He thinks you should sit back down...."
links.text: He thinks you should sit back down. Back straight, now... you're not sitting ANYWHERE.

links.title: You: ""I'm very bad, Kim. Things are very..."
links.text: "I'm very bad, Kim. Things are very bad."

links.title: Endurance: "Through tears and blood and stitche..."
links.text: Through tears and blood and stitches tearing it *should* be possible.

links.title: Volition: "If it's possible, then by pure will..."
links.text: If it's possible, then by pure willpower alone. You are going to have to become... a psycholocomotor.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You won't be able to dance much, th..."
links.text: You won't be able to dance much, that's for sure. You should be able to live with limping around though.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Reasonably bad. You were shot in t..."
links.text: "Reasonably bad. You were shot in the left quadriceps -- that's your thigh. It appears no major arteries were nicked. The bullet was removed and a bacterial infection treated with mercurochrome."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The bruising in your shoulder is n..."
links.text: "The bruising in your shoulder is negligible. The armour took the brunt of the fire."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Reasonably bad. You were shot in t..."
links.text: "Reasonably bad. You were shot in the left quadriceps -- that's your thigh. The outer side thankfully, no major arteries were nicked. The bullet was removed and a bacterial infection treated with mercurochrome."

links.title: You: ""What happens now, Kim?""
links.text: "What happens now, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I honestly don't know.""
links.text: "I honestly don't know."

links.title: You: ""You don't... know?""
links.text: "You don't... know?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't talk to Evrart, the harbo..."
links.text: "We can't talk to Evrart, the harbour is in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. And Joyce has left too."

links.title: You: ""The... Wild Pines representative?""
links.text: "The... Wild Pines representative?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Joyce Messier. On the boat, y..."
links.text: "Yes. Joyce Messier. On the boat, you know? She could have helped us. It's clear the mercenaries were working for Wild Pines. At least partially..." He looks out the window.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her..."
links.text: "Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her end... Either way, Ruby's gone. And Klaasje -- well, at least *she's* safely locked away."

links.title: You: ""You think she could.... be of more..."
links.text: "You think she could.... be of more use to us?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Locked up? No, she would be of mor..."
links.text: "Locked up? No, she would be of more *use* to us free, honestly. But it was the right thing to do."

links.title: You: ""Who did it then, Kim? Who killed t..."
links.text: "Who did it then, Kim? Who killed the hanged man?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think your *incred..."
links.text: "I don't know. I think your *incredibly dangerous* theory on Titus Hardie was wrong. More than six people saw Titus downstairs that night."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Honestly I think our investigation..."
links.text: "Honestly I think our investigation has not produced a single credible suspect." His voice is calm, matter-of-factly.

links.title: You: ""Okay, so once more -- Klaasje has..."
links.text: "Okay, so once more -- Klaasje has *escaped*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Absolutely," he nods. "There's no..."
links.text: "Absolutely," he nods. "There's no other way to go about it. We screwed up."

links.title: Empathy: "He's made his peace with it. He's h..."
links.text: He's made his peace with it. He's had the time to do so.

links.title: You: ""This is because I'm a La Puta Madr..."
links.text: "This is because I'm a La Puta Madre's peone, isn't it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't be narcissistic. Half the co..."
links.text: "Don't be narcissistic. Half the cops in Revachol West are his *peones*. Even if you are, it is not a decisive factor in this case."

links.title: You: ""It's not *whether* I am -- I am. J..."
links.text: "It's not *whether* I am -- I am. Jules told me so, he's from my station."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've heard people say *I* am on La..."
links.text: "I've heard people say *I* am on La Puta Madre's take." He looks you in the eye. "And I am *not*."

links.title: Drama: "He is definitely not on La Puta Mad..."
links.text: He is definitely not on La Puta Madre's take.

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he repeats."
links.text: "Okay," he repeats.

links.title: Logic: "That does make (some) sense."
links.text: That does make (some) sense.

links.title: You: ""The fucking *May bells*, Kim, the..."
links.text: "The fucking *May bells*, Kim, the flowers."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: "(Yank it out and show the dried flo..."
links.text: (Yank it out and show the dried flower, while it falls to pieces.) "This one, remember?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Every piece of garbage in the city..."
links.text: "Every piece of garbage in the city is not connected to the case. You don't have to keep *everything*."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's wrong!"
links.text: He's wrong!

links.title: You: ""No, Kim. Every piece of garbage in..."
links.text: "No, Kim. Every piece of garbage in this city *is* connected to the case."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he concedes -- clearly not..."
links.text: "Okay," he concedes -- clearly not meaning it.

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm.""
links.text: "Mhm."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""They were on the roof. I did not....."
links.text: "They were on the roof. I did not... I did  not catch them. Fucking butterfingers..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Every piece of garbage in the city..."
links.text: "Every piece of garbage in the city is not connected to the case. You don't have to catch *everything*."

links.title: You: ""What about the hole in the... ouch..."
links.text: "What about the hole in the... ouch... wall? Someone was checking her out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know..." He rubs his neck...."
links.text: "I don't know..." He rubs his neck. "That's been there for years."

links.title: You: ""The god damn footprints!""
links.text: "The god damn footprints!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He says. "God curse the foot..."
links.text: "Yes." He says. "God curse the footprints -- not solving the case for us. *Au diable*."

links.title: You: ""There's still a... 28% possibility..."
links.text: "There's still a... 28% possibility the shot came from a distance."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should go upstairs, rethink the..."
links.text: "We should go upstairs, rethink the ballistics *in situ*." A light nod, through some pain. "I agree with this. What else?"

links.title: Volition: "See? There's that. You can do balli..."
links.text: See? There's that. You can do ballistics!

links.title: You: ""An antique bullet... from a Belle-..."
links.text: "An antique bullet... from a Belle-Magrave, 4.46 mm. How hard can it be to find one? How hard can it *be*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's extremely easy. There are tho..."
links.text: "It's extremely easy. There are thousands lying around from the war. All completely unusable. It's precisely how *easy* it is that makes that bullet useless."

links.title: You: ""There are all these... old bunkers..."
links.text: "There are all these... old bunkers and weapon caches around..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We could find thousands more if we..."
links.text: "We could find thousands more if we wanted. All of Revachol is full of them."

links.title: Inland Empire: "But they seemed so mysterious."
links.text: But they seemed so mysterious.

links.title: You: ""I can't believe they're fucking us..."
links.text: "I can't believe they're fucking useless!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to be melodramatic.""
links.text: "No need to be melodramatic."

links.title: You: ""I'm just gonna say nothing...""
links.text: "I'm just gonna say nothing..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There's a little pause -- he says n..."
links.text: There's a little pause -- he says nothing as well.

links.title: You: ""Something is creeping around out t..."
links.text: "Something is creeping around out there. I sense it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is?""
links.text: "What is?"

links.title: You: ""*Something*.""
links.text: "*Something*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Something," he repeats. It does no..."
links.text: "Something," he repeats. It does not sound like he's enthused about this *some-thing*.

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." He hums -- thinking about..."
links.text: "Hmh..." He hums -- thinking about something else.

links.title: You: ""The miracle hasn't happened yet. I..."
links.text: "The miracle hasn't happened yet. It's not over yet."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He does not know what to reply. Loo..."
links.text: He does not know what to reply. Looks out of the window, then back at you.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "It's morning outside, you think."
links.text: It's morning outside, you think.

links.title: You: ""It's simple, we have to locate *co..."
links.text: "It's simple, we have to locate *communism*. Communism killed him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid we may not be able to l..."
links.text: "I'm afraid we may not be able to locate communism, detective -- on account of it being dead."

links.title: You: ""Communism is making a *massive* co..."
links.text: "Communism is making a *massive* comeback, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ideology does not have anything to..."
links.text: "Ideology does not have anything to do with the murder investigation at hand, I'm sorry -- it does not."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A nod."
links.text: A nod.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure? I see communism *eve..."
links.text: "Are you sure? I see communism *everywhere*, telling us what to think, stifling... ouch, my *leg hurts*!"

links.title: You: ""Good. It's good it's dead. Communi..."
links.text: "Good. It's good it's dead. Communism is *stupid*."

links.title: You: ""Okay. Yes. I can see how it's hard..."
links.text: "Okay. Yes. I can see how it's hard to indict someone who is not actually a person."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am glad that you do.""
links.text: "I am glad that you do."

links.title: You: ""You know what I think about... sol..."
links.text: "You know what I think about... solving crimes?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm ready to hear what you think a..."
links.text: "I'm ready to hear what you think about solving crimes now."

links.title: You: ""Solving crimes is hard.""
links.text: "Solving crimes is hard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It really is *very* hard.""
links.text: "It really is *very* hard."

links.title: Empathy: "He sounds surprisingly weary."
links.text: He sounds surprisingly weary.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "That concussion must be making him..."
links.text: That concussion must be making him dizzy.

links.title: You: ""You're not ready to give up, are y..."
links.text: "You're not ready to give up, are you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." There's a short pause. "Are y..."
links.text: "No." There's a short pause. "Are you ready to limp?"

links.title: You: ""That's right. Let's give up. Time..."
links.text: "That's right. Let's give up. Time to start drinking."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think so." There's a short..."
links.text: "I don't think so." There's a short pause. "Are you ready to limp?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you ready to limp?""
links.text: "Are you ready to limp?"

links.title: You: ""Solving crimes is almost impossibl..."
links.text: "Solving crimes is almost impossible."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It can feel that way sometimes, ye..."
links.text: "It can feel that way sometimes, yes."

links.title: You: ""Solving crimes is super easy.""
links.text: "Solving crimes is super easy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? Because, to me, it seems s..."
links.text: "Really? Because, to me, it seems solving crimes is *hard*."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I want to talk about thi..."
links.text: "Actually, I want to talk about this crime some more, before I tell you what I think about its hardness."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm listening.""
links.text: "I'm listening."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He arches his brow -- the ceiling f..."
links.text: He arches his brow -- the ceiling fan patiently spins overhead.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think the *dangero..."
links.text: "I don't know. I think the *dangerous* theory you presented on Klaasje was wrong. We have not found a motive, or a weapon for her."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think the theory y..."
links.text: "I don't know. I think the theory you presented -- it's someone else, outside our circle of suspects -- was right. It'd better be. Everyone within the circle is either dead or gone."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think your *incred..."
links.text: "I don't know. I think your *incredibly dangerous* theory about *you* being the killer was incorrect, however. There is not one piece of evidence to support it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think the theory y..."
links.text: "I don't know. I think the theory you presented -- it being Ruby -- did not add up. If we ever find her, we can pursue her on many offences, but not this one."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That was our job to find out, wasn..."
links.text: "That was our job to find out, wasn't it? Honestly, I just don't know. Our circle of suspects is dead and gone. It's not a circle at all. It's a ruin."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her..."
links.text: "Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her end. Either way, Ruby's gone. And Klaasje too. We really should have arrested her, you know."

links.title: You: ""Wait. You've checked? She's really..."
links.text: "Wait. You've checked? She's really..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Garte confirmed she left 20 minute..."
links.text: "Garte confirmed she left 20 minutes prior to the tribunal showing up."

links.title: You: ""Wait! *Klaasje* is gone too?""
links.text: "Wait! *Klaasje* is gone too?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh yes," he nods. "She left 20 min..."
links.text: "Oh yes," he nods. "She left 20 minutes prior to the tribunal showing up. I asked Mr. Garte."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Turns out it was a bad idea not to..."
links.text: "Turns out it was a bad idea not to arrest her, but..." He shrugs. "Maybe it was a *good deed* that will pay off in heaven."

links.title: Volition: "Who would have figured?"
links.text: Who would have figured?

links.title: Rhetoric: "By the way, the lieutenant does not..."
links.text: By the way, the lieutenant does not actually believe you will be spiritually reimbursed for letting her escape. You just have to live with it.

links.title: You: ""You don't think it was a good idea?""
links.text: "You don't think it was a good idea?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know what to think. It mig..."
links.text: "I don't know what to think. It might not have been a *bad* idea. There is a *pin* somewhere in the machine. Something is keeping Krenel from sending in a death squad..." He looks out the window.

links.title: You: ""Joyce is gone?""
links.text: "Joyce is gone?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, she left yesterday morning. T..."
links.text: "Yes, she left yesterday morning. To meet the board of Wild Pines -- or that is what I've heard. There's a *pin* somewhere in the machine that keeps Krenel from sending in a death squad..." He looks out the window.

links.title: You: ""But... I don't know either.""
links.text: "But... I don't know either."

links.title: You: ""Good, because I totally do.""
links.text: "Good, because I totally do."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you? Because we can't talk to E..."
links.text: "Do you? Because we can't talk to Evrart, the harbour is in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. And Joyce has left too."

links.title: You: ""I'm ready." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "I'm ready." (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." There's a pause. "Where do..."
links.text: "Good." There's a pause. "Where do you want to limp to?"

links.title: You: ""We should check Klaasje's room, up..."
links.text: "We should check Klaasje's room, upstairs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not..." He extinguishes the ci..."
links.text: "Why not..." He extinguishes the cigarette on the sole of his boot.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Another look at the window perhaps..."
links.text: "Another look at the window perhaps -- the one he was shot through? I don't know... I can't think of anything better."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not?" He looks to the ceiling,..."
links.text: "Why not?" He looks to the ceiling, then to the door.

links.title: You: ""Let's just aimlessly wander until..."
links.text: "Let's just aimlessly wander until a clue presents itself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's do that." He extinguishes th..."
links.text: "Let's do that." He extinguishes the cigarette on the sole of his boot.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's do that." He looks to the ce..."
links.text: "Let's do that." He looks to the ceiling. Then the door. "Actually, I'm too tired to walk. Klaasje's room is nearby."

links.title: You: ""I don't know.""
links.text: "I don't know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither do I. Let's walk and hope..."
links.text: "Neither do I. Let's walk and hope something happens before you bleed to death. Klaasje's room is nearby..." He extinguishes the cigarette on the sole of his boot.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither do I. Let's walk and hope..."
links.text: "Neither do I. Let's walk and hope something happens, before you bleed to death. Klaasje's room is nearby..." He looks to the door.

links.title: Logic: "The lieutenant did mention doing mo..."
links.text: The lieutenant did mention doing more ballistics...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Also, it's just close enough to end..."
links.text: Also, it's just close enough to endure the walk.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Ballistics. In Klaasje's room. Do i..."
links.text: Ballistics. In Klaasje's room. Do it *properly*.

links.title: Shivers: "A gust of wind blows in from the ba..."
links.text: A gust of wind blows in from the bay, the duraluminium box around you vibrates imperceptibly... a familiar cold, a red thread on the roof upstairs. Taut. Plucked like a string by the gust.

links.title: You: ""I'm alive...""
links.text: "I'm alive..."
